o Aligning with changes from the API. o The stream consumers now uses the Plexus Logger and not System.err which   really isn't a useful way of debugging. o When checking out code the content is checked out into the working directory   and not "<working directory>/<module name>". This is much more managable and is   hopefully a more compatible with SCM that doesn't have a "module" consept. o The tag command now returns the command output properly inside a TagScmResult.
